name: WebGL2RenderingContext.invalidateFramebuffer
description: The WebGL2RenderingContext.invalidateFramebuffer() method of the WebGL 2 API invalidates the contents of attachments in a framebuffer.

refs.name: WebGL 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'invalidateFramebuffer' in the 'WebGL 2.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 3.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glInvalidateFramebuffer' in the 'OpenGL ES 3.0' specification.
